means: [地名] [加拿大、美国] 科博尔特

word_mean: 钴，一种金属元素，原子序数27
钴用于磁性合金，其化合物可作色素。动物缺乏钴可引起贫血
超过正常饮食要求时，可致红细胞增多。对人类因感染引起的贫血和肾病时的贫血，虽有暂时疗效，但其唯一生理功能可能就是作为维生素B12的一个组成部分。钴放射性同位素，特别是60Co为γ射线发射体，应用于实验生物学及医学，以及癌症治疗

sentence.Network_en: They walked past stalls selling huge sprays of crimson, saffron and cobalt flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们经过很多卖花的摊位，摊位上摆着大把大把的鲜花，有深红色的，有金黄色的，还有深蓝色的。

sentence.Network_en: Sixty - five percent of the special heat resistant metal in a jet engine is made of cobalt.
sentence.Network_cn: 喷气发动机中65%的特殊耐热金属材料是用钴制造的.

sentence.Network_en: A new metal ore found in Northrend is Cobalt.
sentence.Network_cn: 诺森德大陆上新的矿石叫做钴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from German Kobalt 'imp, demon' (from the belief that cobalt was harmful to the ores with which it occurred)

entry.def: Cobalt is a hard silvery-white metal which is used to harden steel and for producing a blue dye.

example.ex: ...a country rich in copper, cobalt and diamonds.
example.tran: 铜、钴和钻石资源丰富的国家

entry.def: Cobalt or cobalt blue is a deep blue colour.

example.ex: They walked past stalls selling huge sprays of crimson, saffron and cobalt flowers.
example.tran: 他们经过很多卖花的摊位，摊位上摆着大把大把的鲜花，有深红色的，有金黄色的，还有深蓝色的。

example.ex: ...a woman in a soft cobalt blue dress.
example.tran: 穿着质地柔软的钴蓝色连衣裙的女人

means.word_mean: 1. a hard ferromagnetic silver-white bivalent or trivalent metallic element; a trace element in plant and animal nutrition
